body.name: Linen Bedding Duvet Cover Set - 100% French Flax Washed Bed Sets Farmhouse Comforter Cover Set (1 Duvet Cover and 2 Pillow Shams) King Size Green
features: 100% Natural French Flax Washed- ATLINIA linen duvet cover sets are made from premium quality French grown flax from Normandy, Certified by OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100. Our linen fabric and finished duvet sets are treated with washed process to ensure cozy soft and not easy to shrink.

What You Can Get - package includes 1 king size (104" x 90") duvet cover & 2 king size (20" x 36") pillow shams. (not including the insert) The bed duvet cover features buttons closure and corner ties on the coner for convinence and comfort. Pillow shams with overlap closure at the central of back.

Why Choose Linen - Linens is unique breathable, cooling, sweating is not sticky. Good natural luster, not easy to fade, not easy to shrink. Heat conduction and moisture absorption is larger than cotton fabric. The wrinkly look is a unique texture of the linen fabric which is more natural and textured.

More Durable - Linen fiber is more durable than cotton and other fibers. Moreover, our bedding duvet cover sets fabric has a 170 GSM, which means our comforter cover sets woven more dense than other bed sets and more durable for all year round and long lasting.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS – Linen duvet cover set is machine washable (30℃ / 86°F), wash separately or with similar colors. Do not bleach. Tumble Dry Low. Try to use the gentle machine cycle. Wrinkle is part of linen's charm, if you do not like wrinkle recommended iron them.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 170GSM Natural Linen Fabric Our duvet cover set are made from 100% pure french linen, woven from 170 GSM which means our linen bedding more durable and heavy weight than others. 7 Secure Corner Ties Comforter cover designed with 7 inside corner ties to secure your comforter insert in place, staying comfort for whole night. Coconut Button Closure Linen duvet cover designed with vintage coconut button closure, adding classic yet elegant style. Wonderful decoration for your home! Envelope Pillow Sham Pillow shams with opening at the central of back, effectively prevent pillow insert slipping out.
Due to different light, it will maybe have a slight color difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My honest review for the ATLINIA Duvet in white, king size.After reading lots of reviews and researching different companies, I purchased a sheet set from an LA based company called Morrow soft goods, $270 (on sale with tax and shipping) for a California king in white.I was able to grab a deal on this ATLINIA Duvet on Amazon for $127. Compared to $300+ at most of the places I looked I decided it was worth a try.What sold me were the grest reviews,100% linen, French grown flax from Normandy (manufactured in China), Certified by OEKO-TEX STANDARD.I wasn’t expecting amazing quality but when I opened the box it was nice packaging, and the linen duvet construction looks solid. No lose threads, or obvious cheapness.Side by side my much more expensive sheets I can say a few things:Morrow: Thick, heavy, scratchy material, not as comfortable out of the box but after 6 (yes 6!) washes they are starting to soften and become comfortable. Quality and I can tell will last.Atlinia: fabric is light and airy, more see through, silky and cool to the touch. Soft and comfortable before washing.For a Duvet I don’t plan to wash as much as sheets I’m perfectly happy with this purchase. It’s beautiful, well made, soft and most importantly completes my linen obsession bed dreams for 1/3 the cost! If it falls apart horribly after washing I’ll update this review but the quality feels there. If anything I can say the fabric is thin so maybe not as long lasting as something thicker. For the price I’m ok with that.If you like researching before a purchase they have a nice Instagram page you can look at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Luxurious and Timeless Linen Duvet Cover!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a linen duvet cover that I absolutely adore. It has transformed my bedroom into a cozy and inviting sanctuary. Allow me to share my review and praise for this remarkable linen duvet cover.From the moment I received the duvet cover, I was impressed by its quality. The fabric feels high-end and is beautifully woven, showcasing its natural texture and adding a touch of rustic charm to my bedding ensemble.BUY IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insanely beautiful and comfy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I didn’t realize how much longer these would be on the sides of my bed but I love it! The fabric is so soft and luxurious, it does wrinkle but I don’t mind at all. I’m probably going to get it in every color because I love these so much lol. I got it in natural and it is more darker in real life but I actually like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Did not expect such a nice quality on amazon. Could be a little thicker. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, but quality control could be better
reviews.reviewText: So first off let me just say this duvet cover feels incredibly luxurious and I think is great value. It’s not easy to find 100% linen bedding at this price point, but after weeks of mulling it over I decided to buy this one. Right out of the box it felt incredibly soft, heavy, and expensive. I know linen gets softer the more you wash it so I can’t wait to see how this investment changes over time. I’ve had it almost 2 months now and it’s been through numerous washes and still feels and looks great, but it does produce a TON of lint in the dryer still. I also have two cats, and while I was worried about claws and hair, the cat hair doesn’t stick to linen like it does cotton, and if one of them is naughty and claws at the fabric, I’m able to move it around and make the small hole close back up! Aside from these pros, I do have two areas of complaint: sizing and the inner ties. I have a queen size duvet insert and this cover is much too big for it so there’s a lot of extra fabric that has to be shuffled around after you put it on. Two of the inner ties were accidentally sewn into the side seam so I have to tie what’s left in a knot, which is either an absolute pain to take out (if I make the knot tight) or comes loose and unties. Regardless, I love the feel of this duvet, so I deal.My recommendations: buy this cover, get an insert that’s a size up from the cover, and check that the ties are all functional before you wash it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Restoration hardware and West Elm
reviews.reviewText: I have had so many sets over the years. Some ridiculously expensive. I have Restoration Hardware, West elm and Pottery barn 100% linen and this is by far my favorite. it’s buttery soft and luxurious. I love the added button details. will definitely buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just received this item. My first impression is that it looks well made and high quality. I had to do a little steaming to get out the wrinkles, but overall...I'm happy with it. It won't get a lot of use in my guest room so it may be a while until I can give a complete review .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Definitely not linen
reviews.reviewText: I’ve owned several sets of 100% linen sheets and this material definitely is not linen. It’s a lot softer which isn’t a bad thing but should not be advertised as linen.
Soft, luxurious and good qualityFeels and looks good

Beautiful duvet cover. It feels thick and high quality. The only reason I gave it four stars is because it is HUGE, so it is a little too big for our queen duvet insert, so we are looking at getting a king insert for the cover. Also on the tag it says “Made in China” which I wasn’t expecting, but it still looks and feels amazing. I have 100% Flax Linen sheets and the duvet cover feels almost identical.
I'm happy with the duvet. I sew and own tons of linen. This fabric does not feel or act like linen. It mimics linen but I don't believe it is 100% linen.
Attention, cette housse n'est pas fabriquée en lin mais d'un tissu ressemble plutôt à de la rayonne synthétique. Elle ne vaut certainement pas 140$.
